Hello,

I am trying to solve three phase equilibrium at 1 atm and 350K. My =
gas
phase species (idealgas mix) involve combustion products and halogens.
=
There are more than 40 species in liquid phase (I had to define each
as sto=
ichiometric liquid) and about 10 solid phase species (each
defined as stoic=
hiometric solid).

When I use multiphase equilibrium, the answer is differe=
nt from that
from popular HSC Chemistry 5.1 program. Has anyone encountered=
 this
problem? Please let me know if you have successfully used a three
pha=
se equilibrium solver and compared to HSC or other multiphase
equilibrium s=
olvers.

My code uses 'importPhases'and Mixture(phases) to import all phase=
s
and species.

Thank you,
Chitral
